design_identity.mission: Create a 'Love Life Debugger' that feels like a high-end, intimate scientific instrument. Dark, moody, but deeply emotional.
core_principles: Fusion: Romantic Emotion x Scientific Precision
Immersion: Dark mode only. No blinding white screens.
Intimacy: Close-up abstract textures, glowing elements.
Clarity: Data (results) must be beautiful and instantly readable.

typography.instructions: Import 'Playfair Display' (400, 700) and 'Manrope' (300, 400, 600) from Google Fonts.

usage_rules: Background must be nearly black (#050505), never pure black (#000000) for less eye strain.
Primary Red (#e11d48) is used for 'Love' and 'Action'. Use sparingly as a spotlight.
Text should never be pure white. Use #fafafa or #e5e5e5.
Borders should be subtle: white/10 or white/5.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay with opacity-5 pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50 mix-blend-overlay

layout_strategies.quiz_container: max-w-2xl mx-auto min-h-[60vh] flex flex-col justify-center

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(225,29,72,0.4)]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-white hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg transition-all
buttons.outline: border border-white/20 hover:border-white/40 hover:bg-white/5 rounded-full px-8 py-6 transition-all

cards.default: bg-zinc-900/50 border border-white/5 rounded-3xl p-8 hover:border-rose-500/30 transition-colors duration-300
cards.highlight: bg-gradient-to-br from-zinc-900 to-black border border-rose-500/20 rounded-3xl p-8 relative overflow-hidden

inputs.default: bg-zinc-900/50 border-white/10 focus:border-rose-500 focus:ring-rose-500/20 h-12 rounded-xl

hero_image.alt: Abstract Red Light in Dark Room

tech_accent.usage: Small icon or card background for 'Scientific Analysis' section

mood_abstract.usage: Background for Results Page or Quiz Section

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic gradients. Use deep, rich solid colors or subtle mesh gradients.
Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text.
All interactive elements must have a :focus-visible state.
Do NOT use 'alert' or 'confirm'. Use custom Dialogs.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE tailwind.config.js with the colors and fonts defined above.
3. CREATE a global layout that enforces the dark theme (add 'dark' class to html/body).
4. BUILD the 'Quiz' flow with Framer Motion for smooth question transitions.
5. IMPLEMENT the 'Results' page with a clear distinction between Free (blurred) and Paid content.
6. USE the provided image URLs for the Hero and decorative elements.
